title: Article 7 : New way to target some rapidly dividing cancer cells, leaving healthy cells unharmed
description: Researchers have found a way to target breast cancer cells by attacking the heart of their cell division mechanism. This technique has only been tested in labs using cancer cells from patients.

title: Article 6 : How breast cancer cells hide from immune attack
description: Researchers have found a way to improve immunotherapy.

title: Article 5  : Scientists find a switch to flip and turn off breast cancer growth and metastasis
description: This article talks about the discovery of two genes that are responsible for breast cancer. Researchers studied these two genes.

title: Article 4  : Venom from honeybees found to kill aggressive breast cancer cells
description: The effect of honeybees venom has been tested on clinical subtypes of breast cancer.

title: Graph on the weight of solid parts of urchins
description: Comparison of data on fisheries urchins and farm's urchins.

title: Article 3 : Study finds global trends in women's breast cancer show cause for concern
description: This article is about premenoposal and postmenoposal cancer. it shows that there are also inequalities in cancer-related mortality around the world.

title: Article 2 : Immunotherapy extends survival in mouse model of hard-to-treat breast cancer
description: Researchers are working on a new type of immunotherapy for triple negative breast cancer that is difficult to treat.

title: Article 1 : Breast cancer: One-dose radiotherapy 'as effective as full course'
description: A new radiotherapy for breast cancer has been developed and tested on women.
